name: Dog Finder 1.0
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 

I didn't have much time with this due to other commitments and stuff going on but I did my best, this was my first game jam outside of University.

I may continue this game because I did have a lot of fun making it and it is very short due to reasons stated prior.

Hope you like it :)
